title: Friends fishing trip
text: Great experience. Nice guest on the boat. Snack, coffe and local drink provided on board. We had also a nice chat with the guest.

title: Fishing
text: Great experience and kind staff. All equipment is provided as well as food and drinks on board. Traditional liquor is provided to try.

title: Supreme fishing
text: We enjoyed the time so much. Even our children were excited by the process. The couple are extremely friendly and kind. They offered us drinks and national drink! They provided us with the equipment necessary for fishing and helped us. And in the evening we enjoyed our freshly caught grilled fish )))

title: Fishing Trip
text: We had an amazing time and it was great to be on the boat as the sun set. The crew were amazing and we laughed lots. Would definitely recommend and good value for money.

title: Fishing trip
text: Amazing fishing trip. If you went for fishing before or this is your first time, they give you everything that you need. They were very welcoming and gave us drinks and food and made it so it was the best experience.

title: Great fishing
text: Excelent crew. Very friendly. Attentive with children. We caught some good fish. We recomend for family fishing.

title: Fishing trip
text: Great fishing trip, nice crew, children friendly . We did a 3hour trip, coffee and some fruits included. I recommend them!Thank you

title: Fishing Tasos !!!

title: Amazing experience!
